meanings.definition: The hard, reddish-brown wood of an East Indian tree, used for cabinetwork.
meanings.sent1: The craftsman crafted a beautiful jewelry box from amboyna.
meanings.sent2: The table was made of polished amboyna wood.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel tried to hide its acorn in the amboyna log.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the room, bouncing off the amboyna walls.
meanings.sent5: The scent of amboyna filled the workshop, inspiring the woodworker.

meanings.definition: A tree of the East Indies, Pterocarpus indicus, of the legume family, yielding amboyna wood.
meanings.sent1: The amboyna tree stood tall in the forest, providing shade to weary travelers.
meanings.sent2: The villagers gathered under the amboyna tree for their annual festival.
meanings.sent3: The monkeys swung from branch to branch on the amboyna tree, playing a game of tag.
meanings.sent4: The roots of the amboyna tree intertwined with those of the neighboring trees, forming a strong bond.
meanings.sent5: The rustling leaves of the amboyna tree whispered secrets to the wind.
